items.title: Arsenal survive 'emotionally tough' Palace shootout
items.summary: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta said it was "emotionally tough" to accept Crystal Palace's stoppage-time equaliser before his team went on to win 8-7 on penalties following a 1-1 draw in their Carabao Cup quarterfinal.

items.title: NWSL OK's 'Rodman rule' even as union objects
items.summary: The NWSL on Tuesday announced the creation of what has been referred to internally as the "High Impact Player" rule (HIP), which would allow teams to spend up to $1 million outside of the salary cap on star players.

items.title: USMNT's Richards stretchered off in Carabao Cup
items.summary: Crystal Palace and United States defender Chris Richards was taken from the field on a stretcher during his team's Carabao Cup game against Arsenal on Tuesday.

items.title: Transfer window preview: What do Europe's big clubs need?
items.summary: The transfer window is set to open across Europe in January, so what are the top clubs planning? Who comes in? Who will go?

items.title: WSL transfer preview: Man United, Arsenal need depth; Liverpool need anyone
items.summary: What will the Women's Super League window bring?

items.title: Van Gerwen: Time for Wright to retire
items.summary: Michael van Gerwen says Peter Wright should retire from darts and was "not surprised" the two-time world champion was knocked out in the second round of the World Championship.

items.title: Man City in advanced talks with Bournemouth's Semenyo
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo is set to make a final decision on his future with Manchester City in advanced talks over a January move for the Bournemouth forward.

items.title: 'Felbegeerde Semenyo hakt knoop door en kiest voor Man City'
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo had de clubs voor het uitkiezen en lijkt dat nu te hebben gedaan. De productieve aanvaller van Bournemouth heeft zijn zinnen naar verluidt gezet op een transfer naar Manchester City.

items.title: Afcon roundup: Nigeria squeeze past Tanzania as Jackson double helps Senegal win
items.summary: Group C: Nigeria 2-1 Tanzania; Tunisia 3-1 Uganda Group D: Senegal 3-0 Botswana; DR Congo 1-0 Benin Ademola Lookman scored a superb second-half winner as Nigeria earned a 2-1 Group C victory against Tanzania in the pouring rain in Fes, a positive start for the silver medallists from the previous tournament, but one that was not without moments of alarm. Nigeria were more dominant than the scoreline suggests in terms of possession and chances, but they failed to finish off the contest and were almost made to pay for their wastefulness in front of goal. Continue reading...

items.summary: This competition may not be Mikel Arteta or Oliver Glasner‚Äôs top priority this season but that didn‚Äôt stop their sides from producing a spectacle full of blood and thunder. It was one-way traffic for Arsenal in the first half but they found Crystal Palace‚Äôs second-string goalkeeper Walter Ben√≠tez in an inspired mood as he kept his team in the contest with some fine saves. items.title: WK als potenti√´le halte in bijzondere reis Locadia: 'Zag ik zelf ook niet meer aankomen'
items.summary: Met Cura√ßao plaatste J√ºrgen Locadia zich in november voor het WK, de aanvaller werd uit het niets bij de selectie van bondscoach Dick Advocaat gehaald. In het Kerstnummer van VI vertelt Locadia over de bijzondere gang van zaken.

items.title: Van Gerwen, Anderson progress after Noppert beaten in final-leg EPIC
items.summary: Former champions Michael van Gerwen and Gary Anderson booked their third-round spots at the World Darts Championship, as sixth seed Danny Noppert crashed out in a final-leg epic at the Alexandra Palace.

items.title: Ben√≠tez ondanks eerherstel tegen Arsenal klaar in bekertoernooi met Palace
items.summary: Arsenal is dinsdagavond doorgedrongen tot de halve finale van de League Cup. Dit gebeurde ten koste van Crystal Palace, dat mede door een uitblinkende Walter Ben√≠tez zijn huid duur verkocht in eigen huis. Het duel werd pas na zestien strafschoppen beslist.

items.title: Arsenal edge Palace on penalties to reach Carabao Cup semi-finals
items.summary: Maxence Lacroix was the villain for Crystal Palace as he scored an own-goal, then missed the crucial penalty to earn Arsenal a Carabao Cup semi-final spot after a dramatic tie that went to spot kicks.

items.title: Manchester City favourites to sign Antoine Semenyo after Chelsea withdraw interest
items.summary: Manchester City in advanced talks over ¬£65m winger Bournemouth winger has release clause in January Manchester City are in pole position to sign Antoine Semenyo after Chelsea cooled their interest in the Bournemouth winger. Liverpool and Manchester United have also been pushing for Semenyo, whose contract contains a ¬£65m release clause that becomes active for the first two weeks of January, but it is believed that the 25-year-old‚Äôs preference is to join City. The clause is made up of a ¬£60m fixed fee and ¬£5m in add-ons. Nothing has been agreed yet. Continue reading...

items.title: B√ºttner trots op Manchester United-periode. 'Een droom'
items.summary: Alexander B√ºttner is een jongen van de club Vitesse, maar dat betekent niet dat zijn andere avonturen geen waarde hebben. Met name bij Manchester United heeft de inmiddels 36-jarige verdediger genoten. Hij vertelt erover in het VI Kerstnummer.

items.title: Incredible DOUBLE save as Benitez keeps out Jesus and Madueke!
items.summary: Walter Benitez pulls off an incredible point-blank save to stop Gabriel Jesus' header and denies Noni Madueke on the rebound in Arsenal's Carabao Cup clash with Crystal Palace.

items.title: Baas zoekt de leider in zichzelf en wijst twee voorbeelden aan
items.summary: Youri Baas vindt dat hij stappen heeft gezet in het ontwikkelen van zijn leiderschap, maar ziet ook nog genoeg ruimte voor verbetering. De 22-jarige Ajacied blikt in een uitgebreid interview terug op zijn ‚Äòbizarre‚Äô 2025.

items.title: Stewart joins Snoop Dogg and Modric as Swans co-owner
items.summary: The 84-year-old American businesswoman has become the latest celebrity owner of Swansea City.

items.title: Hood aiming for nine-darter against Littler in final
